pluggable.name: Photoslide
pluggable.author: Owen Winkler
pluggable.description: Add image assets from a silo to a set so they can be used in a slideshow.

help.value: On activation, this plugin will add a new content type named photoset. That content type has no text content, instead you can add images from a silo to it and give them a title. The photos are then available to your theme. You can get a list of thumbnails (not actual thumbnails, shrinked images) using $post->content_thumbnails and a list of full-size images using $post->content_media. Both lists will already have the necessary HTML tags around them.
